thread.title: Deols bid teary farewell to Abhay Deol’s father, Ajit Singh Deol
thread.title_full: Deols bid teary farewell to Abhay Deol’s father, Ajit Singh Deol

title: Deols bid teary farewell to Abhay Deol’s father, Ajit Singh Deol
text: Deols bid teary farewell to Abhay Deol’s father, Ajit Singh Deol Saturday, 24 October 2015 (16 minutes ago) A bereaved Deol family today bid adieu to one of their loved ones, Ajit Singh Deol. Ajit Singh, who was Dharmendra's younger brother, passed away on Friday, after a brief illness.
